p: Currently, the Global Initiative on Sharing All Influenza Data (GISAID) ( http://www.gisaid.org), have analyzed over 75,853 full genomes of SARS-CoV-2 up to August 30, 2020, with the predominance of the GR clade (23,502), followed by the G clade (17,176), and the GH clade (16,416), among others (Fig.Â 1).
